title: Trade-off between herbal and allopathic treatments: An ethnopharmacological case study in Rema-kalenga wildlife sanctuary, Bangladesh
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Biplob Dey, Romel Ahmed, Jannatul Ferdous, Mohammed Masum Ul Haque, Nusrat Islam, Ashraful Haque, Razu Ahamed
